body:
Finally got the tabular version:

Function Call   Sites and Loops | Self Time, s | Type | Why No Vectorization
-- | -- | -- | --
[loop in   THFloatVector_fill_AVX at AVX.cpp:160] | 18.620s | Scalar | outer loop was not auto-vectorized:   consider using SIMD directive
[loop in   THNN_FloatThreshold_updateGradInput at Threshold.c:54] | 16.449s | Scalar Versions | 1 loop with multiple exits cannot be vectorized unless it meets search   loop idiom criteria
[loop in   THNN_FloatSpatialDilatedMaxPooling_updateOutput_frame$omp$parallel_for@101 at   SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:131] | 12.288s | Scalar | loop with function call not considered an optimization candidate.
[loop in   THNN_FloatThreshold_updateOutput at Threshold.c:17] | 10.369s | Scalar Versions | 1 vector dependence prevents vectorization
[loop in THFloatTensor_copy at   THTensorCopy.cpp:142] | 9.440s | Scalar | loop with multiple exits cannot be vectorized unless it meets search loop   idiom criteria
[loop in   THNN_FloatSpatialDilatedMaxPooling_updateOutput_frame$omp$parallel_for@101 at   SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:109] | 6.524s | Scalar | loop with function call not considered an optimization candidate.
[loop in   THNN_FloatSpatialDilatedMaxPooling_updateGradInput_frame$omp$parallel_for@288   at SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:299] | 4.503s | Scalar | vector dependence prevents vectorization
[loop in   THNN_FloatSpatialDilatedMaxPooling_updateOutput_frame$omp$parallel_for@101 at   SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:129] | 3.001s | Scalar | loop with function call not considered an optimization candidate.
